about_the_game:
Run a transportation empire with planes, trains, automobiles and ships. Out compete AI companies or play solo. Become a transportation tycoon.

First 3 versions of the game included at release.

1) Create a network of trains, busses and planes to connect all the towns together and overseas.
2) Multi stage resource harvesting and transporting. Ore, Ingots and export goods.
3) Make airports to transport people and mail around the map or overseas.
4) Build airports, train stations, truck depots and more.
5) Import goods from overseas and ship them to towns.
6) 20 Resouces to transport from mail to oil.
7) Procedurally generated maps.
8) Maintain fleets of trucks, trains and planes.
9) Large array of trains, trucks, planes and ships to build.
10) Run a transportation empire from 1950 into the modern day.
11) AI companies to compete with or play solo.

.
detailed_description:
Run a transportation empire with planes, trains, automobiles and ships. Out compete AI companies or play solo. Become a transportation tycoon.

First 3 versions of the game included at release.

1) Create a network of trains, busses and planes to connect all the towns together and overseas.
2) Multi stage resource harvesting and transporting. Ore, Ingots and export goods.
3) Make airports to transport people and mail around the map or overseas.
4) Build airports, train stations, truck depots and more.
5) Import goods from overseas and ship them to towns.
6) 20 Resouces to transport from mail to oil.
7) Procedurally generated maps.
8) Maintain fleets of trucks, trains and planes.
9) Large array of trains, trucks, planes and ships to build.
10) Run a transportation empire from 1950 into the modern day.
11) AI companies to compete with or play solo.

.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 2.8 GHz/AMD Phenom II X4 945 3.0 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 550 Ti 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard or Discrete
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 2.8 GHz/AMD Phenom II X4 945 3.0 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 780 2GB/ AMD Radeon R9 290X 2GB or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard or Discrete

name: Epic Trains 4

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 2.8 GHz/AMD Phenom II X4 945 3.0 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 550 Ti 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard or Discrete

short_description: Run a transportation empire with planes, trains, automobiles and ships. Out compete AI companies or play solo. Become a transportation tycoon.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Indonesian
*languages with full audio support
